title: Here is a curated list of 20 articles on meaning representation, covering various aspects such as semantic parsing, knowledge graphs, embeddings, and more. These articles span up to the year 2024 and include some foundational works as well as recent advancements

These articles should provide a comprehensive overview of the field of meaning representation, from foundational theories to cutting-edge research
